verses.verse: וַיֹּאמְר֨וּ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru said אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> 'e-Lav then אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> 'ish And the men אֶפְרַ֗יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim, of Ephraim מָֽה־ <WH4100> mah- unto him Why hast thou הַדָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> had-da-Var us thus הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> haz-Zeh is this עָשִׂ֣יתָ <WH6213> 'a-Si-ta served לָּ֔נוּ La-nu, לְבִלְתִּי֙ <WH1115> le-vil-Ti not קְרֹ֣אות <WH7121> ke-Rot that thou calledst לָ֔נוּ La-nu, כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki when הָלַ֖כְתָּ <WH1980> ha-Lach-ta us not when thou wentest לְהִלָּחֵ֣ם <WH3898> le-hil-la-Chem to fight בְּמִדְיָ֑ן <WH4080> be-mid-Yan; Midian וַיְרִיב֥וּן <WH7378> vay-ri-Vun adversary אִתּ֖וֹ <WH854> it-To for בְּחָזְקָֽה׃ <WH2394> be-cha-ze-Kah. with him sharply

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said אֲלֵיהֶ֔ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem, to מֶה־ <WH4100> meh- What עָשִׂ֥יתִי <WH6213> 'a-Si-ti unto them What have I done עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> 'at-Tah now כָּכֶ֑ם ka-Chem; הֲל֗וֹא <WH3808> ha-Lo, not ט֛וֹב <WH2896> Tov better עֹלְל֥וֹת <WH5955> o-le-Lot now in comparison of you;[Is] not the gleaning אֶפְרַ֖יִם <WH669> 'ef-Ra-yim of the grapes of Ephraim מִבְצִ֥יר <WH1210> miv-Tzir than the vintage אֲבִיעֶֽזֶר׃ <WH44> 'a-vi-'E-zer. Abiezer

בְּיֶדְכֶם֩ <WH3027> be-yed-Chem into your hands נָתַ֨ן <WH5414> na-Tan hath delivered אֱלֹהִ֜ים <WH430> E-lo-Him God אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> sa-Rei the princes מִדְיָן֙ <WH4080> mid-Yan of Midian אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עֹרֵ֣ב <WH6159> 'o-Rev Oreb וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et זְאֵ֔ב <WH2062> ze-'Ev, and Zeeb וּמַה־ <WH4100> u-mah- and what יָּכֹ֖לְתִּי <WH3201> ya-Cho-le-ti and what was I able עֲשׂ֣וֹת <WH6213> a-Sot to do כָּכֶ֑ם ka-Chem; אָ֗ז <WH227> 'Az, Then רָפְתָ֤ה <WH7503> ra-fe-Tah was abated רוּחָם֙ <WH7307> ru-Cham in comparison of you;Then their anger מֵֽעָלָ֔יו <WH5921> me-'a-Lav, and בְּדַבְּר֖וֹ <WH1696> be-dab-be-Ro that הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> had-da-Var toward him when he had said הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. him

וַיָּבֹ֥א <WH935> vai-ya-Vo came גִדְע֖וֹן <WH1439> gid-'on And Gideon הַיַּרְדֵּ֑נָה <WH3383> hai-yar-De-nah; to Jordan עֹבֵ֣ר <WH5674> 'o-Ver [and] passed over ה֗וּא <WH1931> Hu, he וּשְׁלֹשׁ־ <WH7969> u-she-losh- he and the three מֵא֤וֹת <WH3967> me-'ot hundred הָאִישׁ֙ <WH376> ha-'Ish men אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who אִתּ֔וֹ <WH854> it-To, for עֲיֵפִ֖ים <WH5889> 'a-ye-Fim that [were] with him faint וְרֹדְפִֽים׃ <WH7291> ve-ro-de-Fim. yet pursuing

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he said לְאַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH582> le-'an-Shei unto the men סֻכּ֔וֹת <WH5523> suk-Kot, of Succoth תְּנוּ־ <WH5414> te-nu- Give נָא֙ <WH4994> na Please כִּכְּר֣וֹת <WH3603> kik-ke-Rot I pray you loaves לֶ֔חֶם <WH3899> Le-chem, of bread לָעָ֖ם <WH5971> la-'Am unto the people אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who בְּרַגְלָ֑י <WH7272> be-rag-Lai; that follow כִּי־ <WH3588> ki- for עֲיֵפִ֣ים <WH5889> 'a-ye-Fim me for they [be] faint הֵ֔ם <WH1992> Hem, like וְאָנֹכִ֗י <WH595> ve-'a-no-Chi, and I רֹדֵ֛ף <WH7291> ro-Def and I am pursuing אַחֲרֵ֛י <WH310> 'a-cha-Rei after זֶ֥בַח <WH2078> Ze-vach Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֖ע <WH6759> ve-tzal-mun-Na' and Zalmunna מַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> mal-Chei kings מִדְיָֽן׃ <WH4080> mid-Yan. of Midian

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> sa-Rei And the princes סֻכּ֔וֹת <WH5523> suk-Kot, of Succoth הֲ֠כַף <WH3709> Ha-chaf [Are] the hands זֶ֧בַח <WH2078> Ze-vach of Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֛ע <WH6759> ve-tzal-mun-Na' and Zalmunna עַתָּ֖ה <WH6258> 'at-Tah already בְּיָדֶ֑ךָ <WH3027> be-ya-De-cha; now in thine hand כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- should נִתֵּ֥ן <WH5414> nit-Ten that we should give לִֽצְבָאֲךָ֖ <WH6635> litz-va-'a-Cha appointed time לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> La-chem. bread

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer said גִּדְע֔וֹן <WH1439> gid-'on, And Gideon לָכֵ֗ן <WH3651> la-Chen, right בְּתֵ֧ת <WH5414> be-Tet hath delivered יְהוָ֛ה <WH3068> Yah-weh Therefore when the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זֶ֥בַח <WH2078> Ze-vach Zebah וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et צַלְמֻנָּ֖ע <WH6759> tzal-mun-Na' and Zalmunna בְּיָדִ֑י <WH3027> be-ya-Di; into mine hand וְדַשְׁתִּי֙ <WH1758> ve-dash-Ti then I will tear אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּשַׂרְכֶ֔ם <WH1320> be-sar-Chem, your flesh אֶת־ <WH854> 'et- with קוֹצֵ֥י <WH6975> ko-Tzei with the thorns הַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> ham-mid-Bar of the wilderness וְאֶת־ <WH854> ve-'Et and with הַֽבַּרְקֳנִֽים׃ <WH1303> Hab-bar-ko-Nim. and with briers

וַיַּ֤עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al And he went up מִשָּׁם֙ <WH8033> mish-Sham there פְּנוּאֵ֔ל <WH6439> pe-nu-'El, thence to Penuel וַיְדַבֵּ֥ר <WH1696> vay-dab-Ber and spake אֲלֵיהֶ֖ם <WH413> 'a-lei-Hem unto כָּזֹ֑את <WH2063> ka-Zot; unto them likewise וַיַּעֲנ֤וּ <WH6030> vai-ya-'a-Nu answered אוֹתוֹ֙ <WH853> o-To אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> 'an-Shei and the men פְנוּאֵ֔ל <WH6439> fe-nu-'El, of Penuel כַּאֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> ka-'a-Sher after עָנ֖וּ <WH6030> 'a-Nu had answered אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> 'an-Shei as the men סֻכּֽוֹת׃ <WH5523> suk-Kot. of Succoth

וַיֹּ֛אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer And he spake גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- also לְאַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> le-'an-Shei to the men פְנוּאֵ֖ל <WH6439> fe-nu-'El of Penuel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> le-Mor; saying בְּשׁוּבִ֣י <WH7725> be-shu-Vi When I come again בְשָׁל֔וֹם <WH7965> ve-sha-Lom, in peace אֶתֹּ֖ץ <WH5422> 'et-Totz I will break down אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַמִּגְדָּ֥ל <WH4026> ham-mig-Dal this tower הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> haz-Zeh. this פ Peh

וְזֶ֨בַח <WH2078> ve-Ze-vach Now Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֜ע <WH6759> ve-tzal-mun-Na' and Zalmunna בַּקַּרְקֹ֗ר <WH7174> bak-kar-Kor, [were] in Karkor וּמַחֲנֵיהֶ֤ם <WH4264> u-ma-cha-nei-Hem and their hosts עִמָּם֙ <WH5973> 'im-Mam with כַּחֲמֵ֤שֶׁת <WH2568> ka-cha-Me-shet fif עָשָׂר֙ <WH6240> 'a-Sar teen אֶ֔לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef, thousand כֹּ֚ל <WH3605> kol that הַנּ֣וֹתָרִ֔ים <WH3498> han-No-ta-Rim, [men] all that were left מִכֹּ֖ל <WH3605> mik-Kol of all מַחֲנֵ֣ה <WH4264> ma-cha-Neh of all the hosts בְנֵי־ <WH1121> ve-nei- of the children קֶ֑דֶם <WH6924> Ke-dem; of the east וְהַנֹּ֣פְלִ֔ים <WH5307> ve-han-No-fe-Lim, for there fell מֵאָ֨ה <WH3967> me-'Ah an hundred וְעֶשְׂרִ֥ים <WH6242> ve-'es-Rim and twenty אֶ֛לֶף <WH505> 'E-lef thousand אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish men שֹׁ֥לֵֽף <WH8025> Sho-lef that drew חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> Cha-rev. sword

וַיַּ֣עַל <WH5927> vai-Ya-'al went up גִּדְע֗וֹן <WH1439> gid-'on, And Gideon דֶּ֚רֶךְ <WH1870> De-rech by the way הַשְּׁכוּנֵ֣י <WH7931> hash-she-chu-Nei of them that dwelt בָֽאֳהָלִ֔ים <WH168> vo-'o-ha-Lim, in tents מִקֶּ֥דֶם <WH6924> mik-Ke-dem on the east לְנֹ֖בַח <WH5025> le-Noach of Nobah וְיָגְבֳּהָ֑ה <WH3011> ve-ya-ge-bo-Hah; and Jogbehah וַיַּךְ֙ <WH5221> vai-yaCh and smote אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֔ה <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh, the host וְהַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> ve-ham-ma-cha-Neh for the host הָ֥יָה <WH1961> Ha-yah become בֶֽטַח׃ <WH983> Ve-tach. was secure

וַיָּנ֗וּסוּ <WH5127> vai-ya-Nu-su, fled זֶ֚בַח <WH2078> Ze-vach And when Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֔ע <WH6759> ve-tzal-mun-Na', and Zalmunna וַיִּרְדֹּ֖ף <WH7291> vai-yir-Dof he pursued אַחֲרֵיהֶ֑ם <WH310> 'a-cha-rei-Hem; after וַיִּלְכֹּ֞ד <WH3920> vai-yil-Kod them and took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁנֵ֣י׀ <WH8147> she-Nei the two מַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> mal-Chei kings מִדְיָ֗ן <WH4080> mid-Yan, of Midian אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זֶ֙בַח֙ <WH2078> ze-vach Zebah וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et צַלְמֻנָּ֔ע <WH6759> tzal-mun-Na', and Zalmunna וְכָל־ <WH3605> ve-chol the whole הַֽמַּחֲנֶ֖ה <WH4264> ham-ma-cha-Neh all the host הֶחֱרִֽיד׃ <WH2729> he-che-Rid. and discomfited

וַיָּ֛שָׁב <WH7725> vai-Ya-shov returned גִּדְע֥וֹן <WH1439> gid-'on And Gideon בֶּן־ <WH1121> ben- the son יוֹאָ֖שׁ <WH3101> yo-'Ash of Joash מִן־ <WH4480> min- from הַמִּלְחָמָ֑ה <WH4421> ham-mil-cha-Mah; from battle מִֽלְמַעֲלֵ֖ה <WH4608> mil-ma-'a-Leh before הֶחָֽרֶס׃ <WH2775> he-Cha-res. the sun

וַיִּלְכָּד־ <WH3920> vai-yil-kod- And caught נַ֛עַר <WH5288> Na-'ar a young man מֵאַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH582> me-'an-Shei of the men סֻכּ֖וֹת <WH5523> suk-Kot of Succoth וַיִּשְׁאָלֵ֑הוּ <WH7592> vai-yish-'a-Le-hu; and enquired וַיִּכְתֹּ֨ב <WH3789> vai-yich-To of him and he described אֵלָ֜יו <WH413> 'e-Lav about אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שָׂרֵ֤י <WH8269> sa-Rei unto him the princes סֻכּוֹת֙ <WH5523> suk-kOt of Succoth וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et זְקֵנֶ֔יהָ <WH2205> ze-ke-Nei-ha, and the elders שִׁבְעִ֥ים <WH7657> shiv-'Im seventy-seven וְשִׁבְעָ֖ה <WH7651> ve-shiv-'Ah seven אִֽישׁ׃ <WH376> 'Ish. men

וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> vai-ya-Vo And he came אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to אַנְשֵׁ֣י <WH376> 'an-Shei the men סֻכּ֔וֹת <WH5523> suk-Kot, of Succoth וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer and said הִנֵּ֖ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold זֶ֣בַח <WH2078> Ze-vach Behold Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֑ע <WH6759> ve-tzal-mun-Na'; and Zalmunna אֲשֶׁר֩ <WH834> 'a-Sher whom חֵרַפְתֶּ֨ם <WH2778> che-raf-Tem with whom ye did upbraid אוֹתִ֜י <WH853> o-Ti לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> le-Mor, me saying הֲ֠כַף <WH3709> Ha-chaf [Are] the hands זֶ֣בַח <WH2078> Ze-vach of Zebah וְצַלְמֻנָּ֤ע <WH6759> ve-tzal-mun-Na' and Zalmunna עַתָּה֙ <WH6258> 'at-Tah already בְּיָדֶ֔ךָ <WH3027> be-ya-De-cha, now in thine hand כִּ֥י <WH3588> ki should נִתֵּ֛ן <WH5414> nit-Ten that we should give לַאֲנָשֶׁ֥יךָ <WH376> la-'a-na-Shei-cha to your men הַיְּעֵפִ֖ים <WH3286> hai-ye-'e-Fim faint לָֽחֶם׃ <WH3899> La-chem. bread

וַיִּקַּח֙ <WH3947> vai-yik-Kach And he took אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זִקְנֵ֣י <WH2205> zik-Nei the elders הָעִ֔יר <WH5892> ha-'Ir, of the city וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et קוֹצֵ֥י <WH6975> ko-Tzei and thorns הַמִּדְבָּ֖ר <WH4057> ham-mid-Bar of the wilderness וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et הַֽבַּרְקֳנִ֑ים <WH1303> hab-bar-ko-Nim; and briers וַיֹּ֣דַע <WH3045> vai-Yo-da' and with them he taught בָּהֶ֔ם ba-Hem, אֵ֖ת <WH853> 'et אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> 'an-Shei the men סֻכּֽוֹת׃ <WH5523> suk-Kot. of Succoth

וְאֶת־ <WH853> ve-'Et מִגְדַּ֥ל <WH4026> mig-Dal the tower פְּנוּאֵ֖ל <WH6439> pe-nu-'El of Penuel נָתָ֑ץ <WH5422> na-Tatz; And he beat down וַֽיַּהֲרֹ֖ג <WH2026> vai-ya-ha-Rog and slew אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> 'an-Shei the men הָעִֽיר׃ <WH5892> ha-'Ir. of the city

וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> vai-Yo-mer, Then said אֶל־ <WH413> 'el- to זֶ֙בַח֙ <WH2078> ze-vach he unto Zebah וְאֶל־ <WH413> ve-'el- and צַלְמֻנָּ֔ע <WH6759> tzal-mun-Na', and Zalmunna אֵיפֹה֙ <WH375> 'ei-Foh What הָאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <WH376> ha-'a-na-Shim, of men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher whom הֲרַגְתֶּ֖ם <WH2026> ha-rag-Tem [were they] whom ye slew בְּתָב֑וֹר <WH8396> be-ta-Vor; destruction וַֽיֹּאמְרוּ֙ <WH559> vai-yo-me-Ru said כָּמ֣וֹךָ <WH3644> ka-Mo-cha As thou כְמוֹהֶ֔ם <WH3644> che-mo-Hem, were like אֶחָ֕ד <WH259> 'e-Chad [art] so [were] they each one כְּתֹ֖אַר <WH8389> ke-To-'ar resembled בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the children הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> ham-Me-lech. of a king
